attributes.action: amend this website so that we may also vote against petitions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Unless you know how many people would vote against a petition, it is little worth knowing how many voted in favour of it.

I might create a petition to increase my salary, and might whip up thousands of votes (well, I can think of at least two). I would imagine that the rest of the population would want to vote against it, but they have no mechanism for voicing their opposition.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
